descriptionHTML:
Wear calculator is a powerful calculator application with all the basic operations you would need in daily matters. With an in app numeric keyboard, it allows you to use all of the features of calculator on your wearable device trouble free. The Wear Calculator comes with a stylish look and adaptive design that fits perfect for your cell phone as well as for your wearable’s.

Features:
Basic mathematic operations.
Wearable as well as cell phone compatible
Basic trigonometric operations on both wearable and hand held.
Reliable, fast and efficient in use.

Please feel free to send us your feedback. Your feedback is important to us. Kindly rate us good. Your good rating keeps us going!
